column1: #text=Yesterday I found a great recipe for a chocolate cake with peanut butter swirls .
#text=I went to the store to buy all the ingredients .
#text=I had to get eggs , sugar , milk and peanut butter .
#text=I got out a big mixing bowl and mixed all the ingredients up with a big wooden spoon .
#text=I preheated the oven while I was mixing everything together .
#text=I had to wait a few minutes for the oven to be ready for the concoction sitting on my counter .
#text=I poured the batter into a cake pan and licked the spoon .
#text=I put the pan into the oven and waited 25 minutes .
#text=It smelled incredible while it was baking .
#text=I tested the moisture of the cake by sticking a toothpick into the middle .
#text=I let the cake cool for 30 minutes and then cut it into pieces .
#text=I shared it with my family and we all agreed it was one of the tastiest cakes we 've ever eaten .
